CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper July 20, 1946, pg. 18, reads: "Story Hour - The kiddies listen attentively as Mrs. Margaret Ludwig (seated) tells them a story at the Soho Community House Library, a station of the Wylie Avenue Branch Carnegie Library. Miss Leontine Pullman, page, looks on. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Margaret Ludwig seated with book reading to children, with Leontine Pullman standing on left, in Soho Community House Library
